claims.claim: Pre-release engagement between reentry programs and inmates facilitates stronger relationships.
claims.quote: if I, if I meet you before you come home, especially if it's like six months before you come home, then it becomes a relationship that you have with Adam.

claims.claim: Early engagement with future returnees fosters meaningful connections.
claims.quote: if I meet you before you come home, [...] then it becomes a relationship that you have with Adam.

claims.claim: Waiting to engage with returnees post-release reduces the impact of reentry supports.
claims.quote: If I wait till three days after you become home. Come home, I just become another appointment.

claims.claim: Reentry programs adopt organic methods to inform incarcerated individuals of their services.
claims.quote: we're old school we'll mail flyers in to make sure that people know that we're that, that we exist.

claims.claim: Families within communities provide connections to incarcerated individuals returning home.
claims.quote: We do it by getting to know families in the communities that have people that are incarcerated cuz they know who's coming back out to the community.
